learn_buttons.title: Learn Controller Buttons
learn_buttons.description:
Learn the button commands for your {controller_type} controller at ID location {id_location}.

**Learn {button_name}**

Progress: {learned_count}/{total_buttons} buttons learned

**Instructions:**
1. Press and hold the **P3 button** on your existing remote control (you will hear a continuous tone).
2. Click **Send Learn Command** as the tone begins.
3. When you hear the confirmation tones (you may hear multiple beeps), click **I heard the confirmation tones** to advance.
4. If you didn't hear them, click **I didn't hear it - retry** to resend without advancing.

If you don't need this button, choose **Skip**.
